comment:
* @deprecated Old text-only interface to the clipboard.  See
 * {@link android.content.ClipboardManager} for the modern API.

methods.name: public abstract CharSequence getText()
methods.comment:
* Returns the text on the clipboard.  It will eventually be possible
     * to store types other than text too, in which case this will return
     * null if the type cannot be coerced to text.

methods.name: public abstract void setText(CharSequence text)
methods.comment: * Sets the contents of the clipboard to the specified text.

methods.name: public abstract boolean hasText()
methods.comment: * Returns true if the clipboard contains text; false otherwise.
